text: Skipping may refer to: * The hippity-hoppity gait that comes naturally to children * A game or form of exercise using a skipping rope * Stone skipping, throwing a stone so that it bounces off the surface of water * String skipping, a guitar-playing technique * Snowmobile skipping, a sport where drivers hydroplane snowmobiles on lakes or rivers * British slang for dumpster diving * an episode of the television series Teletubbies * a song by the band Associates from their 1982 album Sulk * Truancy ==See also== * * Skip (disambiguation) * Oswald Skippings (born 1953), former Chief Minister of the Turks and Caicos Islands
title: Skipping
